title: Yay, an intended Assassin support.
body: Still gonna play Kat Camille and Leb down there, but nice addition.

replies.body: Waiting on an {{champion:222}}  sister support
A rioter confirmed on Reddit that VI and Jinx were sisters.
If you're talking the news that came from the video with Ghostcrawler, that was actually confirmed to be misinformation afterwards.

Yes, I thought it was canon that they were sisters and that the interview question just got lost in translation. But the official Riot stance is that they may or may not be sisters. And that isn't because we just don't want you all to know the answer. It's because we literally have not made the call. It was my mistake.
Pretty cool of you to just straight up admit to the mistake in a situation where you didn't even need to respond.

> [{quoted}](name=Ghostcrawler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5zZXe4Tz,comment-id=0000000000010000,timestamp=2018-05-15T18:47:54.589+0000)
>
> Yes, I thought it was canon that they were sisters and that the interview question just got lost in translation. But the official Riot stance is that they may or may not be sisters. And that isn't because we just don't want you all to know the answer. It's because we literally have not made the call. It was my mistake.

Thank you

> [{quoted}](name=Ghostcrawler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5zZXe4Tz,comment-id=0000000000010000,timestamp=2018-05-15T18:47:54.589+0000)
>
> Yes, I thought it was canon that they were sisters and that the interview question just got lost in translation. But the official Riot stance is that they may or may not be sisters. And that isn't because we just don't want you all to know the answer. It's because we literally have not made the call. It was my mistake.

personally, i'd prefer if they weren't sisters, and we got a new champion that is confirmed as Jinx's *real* sister... then she can have some snarky voice lines/taunts toward Vi about the "Vi being Jinx's sister" theory :D
proof?

> [{quoted}](name=Sassmast3r,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5zZXe4Tz,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-05-14T19:50:11.802+0000)
>
> proof?

https://www.riftherald.com/2017/9/28/16380542/jinx-vi-sisters-lol-lore-holy-crap-finally-guys-its-confirmed

Not true, as indicated in the original Reddit thread linked by RiftHerald:

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/72yxc7/the_truth_has_been_spoken_jinx_and_vi_are_sisters/dnmys3p/

Vi and Jinx have inverted color schemes clearly they have some connections to each other as jinx only seems to care about vi also Ekko knows Jinx and vi on some kinda personal level (or at least did know them) so again another thing that seems to connect them unless riot out right denies that jinx and vi are sisters it will be the most likely conclusion

Sisters don't have to be blood-related either. If they were members of some child gang with a Roman numeral theme, it's extremely likely Jinx would consider Vi as a sister of some sort especially with how deranged and obsessed she is.

Not to mention that Jinx loves blowing shit up and Vi is all about being a human wrecking ball, they'd be a terrifying duo in-universe.

i would support vi/Jinx partnership they could be the perfect crime duo or better yet Jinx/cait/Vi Three way crime fighting duo where vi and cait have to rehabilitate jinx and clean jinx act up while having her help them solve cases and stop bank robberies (ok i took that last part from a fanfic)
you realize thats basically whats already going on with Vi herself
I highly doubt that would happen tbh, but I can see temporary team-ups happening.

> [{quoted}](name=saltran,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5zZXe4Tz,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-05-14T19:32:38.847+0000)
>
> A rioter confirmed on Reddit that VI and Jinx were sisters.

In the whole existance of LoL, never a a Rioter said such thing. If they were sisters, they would have been listed as sister in their profiles like Garen and Lux or Yasuo and Yone
Careful, I mentioned this not that long ago and got downvoted to hell.  Apparently Ghostcrawler saying it means it holds no value.

I fully expect him to take over the jungle. stealth/gapcloser/hooking character who copies kill gold on an execute ult. 

You better hope his numbers are LITERALLY Garbage.
The problem is that if his numbers are garbage then his passive that converts any bonus HP he builds into AD is a death sentence for him.
I feel like that is the issue with an assassin support. if his numbers aren't trash he won't be played as a support and if they are trash he won't be played at all

I assume what they've done is give him really strong burst damage (mainly once he has ult) but really weak dps. if his q isn't enough to get him through the jungle then he wont be strong there. you need dps to jungle. 

I get the impression that 1-5 he's not that different from other supports, and its at 6 that his assassination potential comes online
Ya we'll  have to wait to see his numbers,but unless his Q has a stupid high cd and does no damage I'm gonna try to play him jungle anyways lol.
its 15 seconds, fairly long
Ouch. Still gonna do it, I watched someone else play him in the jungle do well enough
Any competent jungler will eat him.  Even if his numbers are decent, he's going to have a terrible clear.
Was mid lane too tough for you or something?

The opposite.

I first started going Kat Solo bot for a fun  challenge and it was fun. So I kept doing it until eventually i started playing her both a carry and a support.  Not just a mid laner.

I'll stick with my Glacial Augment Ahri support with:

{{item:3098}} {{item:3030}} as her core items.

Meanwhile:

http://na.op.gg/champion/ahri/statistics/support
I expect a Gunblade Lux support main to think that Kat and LB are viable supports.

?

I'm a Kat main.
Why not Electrocute Ryze support? You literally just mash the keyboard as fast as possible until W is up in which case you E then W.
I would want to test my kha'zix support pocket pick vs Pyke
